original_text: And Mephibosheth had a young son, whose name was Micha. And all that dwelt in the house of Ziba were servants unto Mephibosheth.
korean_text: 므비보셋에게 어린 아들 하나가 있으니 이름은 미가더라 시바의 집에 사는 자마다 므비보셋의 종이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Mephibosheth had a young son
And all that dwelt in the house of Ziba
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 싸바의 집에 거하던 모든 자들은
